column5: Close to historic Brenham, Chappell Hill, Washington & Independence. Gorgeous Victorian-style home with 5 bedrooms, 5.5 baths. Each room has a private en suite bathroom. Full breakfast served by innkeeper included in rate. Good for couples, business travelers, and groups -- perfect place for a girls getaway, small group Bible retreat, writers group retreat, or a group going to Texas A&M for a ball game (Kyle Field is 40 minutes away).
